column4: Integrates into the organizational environment by participating in and promoting teamwork and respecting and making use of diversity to enrich dialogue and the decision-making process.
We believe that we are able to always do more and better, exceeding challenges with discipline, humility, and simplicity
We believe that persons are unique and that they deserve to be valued fairly and according to their deliveries
We believe and trust people, and for these reasons, we invest time and resources fostering talent
Systematically uses external knowledge and experience in processes of improvement and renewal.
Swiftly makes the changes necessary for strategic implementation, pre-empting events and aligning and mobilizing his/her staff.
We believe that our success is the result of joint construction, strengthened by genuine relations and alliances where everyone wins
We believe that an environment of confidence provides open dialogues and space for speaking up and being heard, where the diversity of opinions builds better solutions
Aplica sistematicamente os processos de gestão definidos pela unidade / empresa.
Atua com uma perspectiva focada no cliente (externo e/ou interno).
Avalia o impacto de suas ações nas demais áreas/negócios da empresa, identificando oportunidades e riscos.
Contribui para um clima de diálogo aberto e colaboração, e favorece um ambiente de alta performance.
Estabelece planos de ação sustentáveis, que demonstram preocupação com o longo prazo da sua área (indo além das metas de curto prazo).
Faz gestão das suas metas e da rotina, garantindo a entrega dos resultados e das responsabilidades do seu cargo.
Gerencia riscos e assegura compliance.
Impacta e/ou influencia nas mudanças e no alcance das metas da organização.
Otimiza recursos, estabelece a melhor relação custo / benefício.
Questiona os paradigmas da organização visando melhorias.
É conectado com o mundo exterior e cria um ambiente propício à inovação.

Respect for Differences
Teamwork
Acts with critical sense, compares and learns with experience.
Creates, innovates and establishes new and better practices.
Overcomes challenges with discipline, humility, and simplicity.
Seeks continuously to exceed self.
Surprises others positively with the solutions and results presented.
Recognize the people that present differentiated performances.
Takes decisions about people based on collective and individual performance.
Takes decisions on people based in the alignment with the Values and Beliefs of the Group.
They trust in their own work and in their capacity to contribute to the company.
Treats people in a differentiated form, according to their deliveries, managing conflict.

Create a motivating and inspiring work environment.
Create conditions and provides opportunities for people to exercise their potential.
Facilitate internal mobility, giving or receiving people of other areas.
Identify and brings talent to the organization.
In his/her decisions, considers the personal moment and the of individual's career expectations.
Invests in people development.
Knows how to identify and uses the best competences / abilities of people.
Provide constructive feedback.
Pursuit of Best Practices
Understanding of the Big Picture
Impact and Influence
Initiative
Readiness for Change
Conquers the commitment of others involved in his / her projects.
Creates and strengthens genuine relationships and partnerships in which everyone wins.
Develops and uses the net of relationships to generate value.
Has team spirit and makes clients, suppliers, and community partners become his / her partners.
Shares challenges to identify the best solutions.
Takes attitudes that contribute with others.
Adopts an open stance for receiving new ideas.
Acts according to what is spoken.
Considers and stimulates the diversity of opinions.
Creates an environment of confidence, with space for speaking up and hearing.
Demonstrates courage to expose own ideas.
Is quick and proactive in the transfer of prominent information.
Prioritizes contact and the direct communication.
